title: Thriller - Volume 01
description: 20 cinematic themes, for dark ambient, true crime, investigation suspense and extreme contents.
longDescription:
Preview on:

  • Youtube


Thriller - Volume 01 is a collection of 20 dark cinematic themes perfectly suited for underground, role-playing games, FPS.

This pack will create a perfect atmosphere for exploring dangerous places, true crime, investigation projects.

Each track is presented with many loops for further editing.


Tracklist:

  • Abused Full length (01:45), 7 Loops, 2 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • All Of A Sudden Full length (01:37), 6 Loops, 2 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Bad Feeling Full length (02:27), 9 Loops, 2 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Criminal Archives Full length (02:02), 8 Loops, 2 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Digital Homicide Full length (01:50), 6 Loops, 2 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Dramatic Moments Full length (01:33), 5 Loops, 3 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Highways Around Midnight Full length (01:31), 5 Loops, 2 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Hyperattack Full length (01:38), 11 Loops, 3 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Incoming Future Full length (01:52), 9 Loops, 2 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Investigation In Progress Full length (01:37), 5 Loops, 2 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Mission Aborted Full length (01:46), 8 Loops, 3 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Plastic Monsters Full length (02:10), 5 Loops, 2 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Pulsing Crime Full length (01:38), 7 Loops, 2 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Ransom Full length (01:48), 5 Loops, 3 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Shadow Killers Full length (01:30), 8 Loops, 2 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Skyline Crime Scene Full length (01:25), 8 Loops, 2 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Suspicious Activities Full length (01:56), 9 Loops, 2 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Tactical Operation Full length (01:55), 8 Loops, 3 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Think Again Full length (01:36), 6 Loops, 3 Edits, Intro&Outro
  • Undercover Investigation Full length (02:01), 8 Loops, 3 Edits, Intro&Outro


Take a look: Total Game Music Collection - 500 High Quality music themes ideal for any game!

Maybe you might be interested at Phobia Vol.1 and Fright Night Vol.2 collections.


This pack is produced by Luca Tomassini a composer with more than 20 years of expertise in music production with multiple TV, feature films and multimedia placements.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Full length tracks: 20
  •  Loops: 141
  •  Edits: 47
  • Intro 21
  • Outro 21


Number of Audio Wavs: 250

Number of Audio Cues: 250

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 1h, 06m, 59s

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes


﻿- Terms of Usage and Licensing Notes outside the game engine.

All packages by Frequently Asked Music are meant to be used within Unreal Engine. Please contact us at studio@frequentlyaskedmusic.com for further clearance in case you want to use a specific track for other purposes - YouTube videos, social marketing, promo.
